```{r} 
orangeec <- read.csv("/Users/rey_g/Proyecto_R/DataFrame/orangeec.csv")
data(orangeec)
summary(orangeec)
```
Parece que hay correlacion entre aporte de economia naranja al PIB y la tasa de desempleo.
```{r}
pairs(orangeec[,6:10])
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```
```{r}
ggplot() +geom_histogram(data = orangeec,
                         aes(x=Internet.penetration...population),fill ="pink", color ="black",
                         binwidth = 5)+
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(40,max(100),5))+
  labs(x="Penetracion de Internet", y="Cantidad de Paises",
       title = "Penetracion de internet en los Paises de LATAM")+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  theme(panel.background = element_blank(),panel.grid.major =  element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank())
```
